testsuite.name: ChuckNorrisTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #96
To produce a series of same value bits, should be used two consecutive blocks, so printed code should contain even amount of blocks
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Input string: > greetings!
The result: 0 00 00 00 0 0000 000 00 00 0 0 00 00 00 00 00 0 0 00 0 0 00 00 00 00 0 0 00 0 0 00 000 00 0 0 0 00 000 00 00 0 0 0 00 00 0 00 00 00 0 0 000 00 00 00 00 00 0 0000 000 00 00 0 0000 0 0 0 00 0000 0 0
